create-user.TOAST_SUCCESS: The user has been successfully created
create-user.TOAST_ERROR: An error occurred during account creation
create-user.TOAST_ERROR_ALREADY_EXIST: An account already exists with this e-mail address.

update-user.TOAST_SUCCESS: Your user has been successfully updated
update-user.TOAST_ERROR: An error has occurred while saving updates.

update-user-password.ERROR: An error occurred while updating the password

delete-user.TOAST_SUCCESS: The user has been successfully deleted
delete-user.TOAST_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting the user.
